title: Erkenntnis
additional-notes: This is a Dutch publication. Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US.
This was published as 'The Journal of Unified Science (Erkenntnis)' in 1939 and 1940. Publication was suspended from 1940 to 1975.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Felice Gollotti and Shelton Henderson for copyright research on this title.
